Kassadin.title: ºøthe Void Walkerº
Kassadin.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere is a place between dimensions and between worlds. To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown. To most, however, it is called the Void. Despite its name, the Void is not an empty place, but rather the home of unspeakable things, horrors not meant for minds of men. Though such knowledge is lost in modern times, there are those who have unwittingly discovered what lies beyond, and they have been unable to turn away. Kassadin is such a creature. He was once a man forced to look upon the face of the Void and forever changed by what he saw. Once a seeker of forbidden knowledge, he discovered that what he sought was something else entirely. He is one of the few that has found his way to forgotten Icathia and lived to tell the tale, following the scant breadcrumbs hidden in ancient texts.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWithin a decaying cyclopean city, Kassadin found secrets of the kind that he will never share - secrets that made him quake with fear at the visions of things to come that were thrust upon him. The power of the place threatened to consume him forever, but Kassadin took the only route available to him in order to survive - he let the Void inside him. Miraculously, he was able to overcome the alien urges that went with it, and he emerged as something more than human. Though a part of him died that day, he knows that he must protect Valoran from the things scratching at the door, waiting to get in and visit their torments upon the world. They are only one step away... something to which the appearance of the abomination known as Cho'Gath attests.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºIf you look upon the Void, you can't put it behind you. If you look upon Kassadin, he is probably already there.ºøºøºøºøºøº
Kassadin.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere is a place between dimensions and between worlds. To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown. To most, however, it is called the Void. Despite ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKassadin has multiple item paths; he can go caster via mana and ability power or anti caster with cooldown reduction and Magic Resist.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøKassadin's ultimate has many uses and is on a shorter cooldown than most, use it often.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøTry to get the Ancient Golem buff to counteract Riftwalk's increasing mana cost.øºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºKassadin deals mostly magic damage. If he's doing well consider buying magic resist items like Mercury's Treads and Banshee's Veil.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøEach time Kassadin consecutively uses Riftwalk, he pays more and more mana.   Keep this in mind as you chase him.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIt takes 6 spell casts for Kassadin's slow, Force Pulse, to become castable. If he levels up that ability, judiciously use your own skills while laning against him.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºNull Sphereº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøKassadin fires an ethereal bolt of void energy, dealing damage and silencing the target for a duration.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøKassadin fires a void bolt, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and silencing the target for ºøºøº{{ e2 }}º second(s).º

spells.name: ºNether Bladeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPassive: Kassadin's basic attacks restore Mana. The Mana restored is tripled against enemy champions. Active: Kassadin's basic attacks deal additional magic damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºøKassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, restoring øºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºø Mana each hit. If the target is an enemy champion, the Mana restored is tripled to ºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}.

ºActive: ººøºøKassadin charges his nether blade for øºøº{{ e4 }}ºøºøºø seconds causing his basic attacks to deal an additional ºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

spells.name: ºForce Pulseº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºKassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and slow enemies by ºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø% for 3 seconds in a cone in front of him.øºøº

spells.name: ºRiftwalkº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Additionally, multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana and deal additional damage.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºKassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Additionally, each subsequent Riftwalk within the next ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø seconds costs º{{ cost }}ºø additional Mana and deals ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºø additional damage, stacks up to 10 times.øºøº

passive.name: ºVoid Stoneº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºKassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and transforms this damage into bonus attack speed.ºøºøºøºøº

Katarina.name: ºKatarinaº
Katarina.title: ºøthe Sinister Bladeøº
Katarina.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºDriven by an intense killer instinct, Katarina uses her talents as an assassin for the glory of Noxus, and the continued elevation of her family. While her fervor drives her to ever-greater feats, it can sometimes lead her astray.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFrom childhood, Katarina displayed a natural gift for combat. As the daughter of a prominent Noxian general many paths were open to her, but she rejected them all for the path of the blade. Rigorously trained by the finest assassins in Noxus, her father the best among them, it was not long before Katarina demanded her first assignment. The task they gave her was aggravatingly simple: assassinate a low-ranking Demacian officer. As she set to her work infiltrating the enemy camp, Katarina discovered an opportunity too tantalizing to pass by - the arrival of a Demacian General. Stalking him to his tent, she quietly dispatched his guards and slit his throat. Pleased with her impressive kill, she disappeared into the night. Katarina's elation faded the next day when her original objective, the Demacian officer, led his forces to ambush unprepared Noxian soldiers. Though the Noxians fought valiantly, they suffered heavy casualties. Furious at her mistake, Katarina set off to complete her original task. Returning to the camp, she spied her now heavily guarded target and realized a stealthy kill was no longer possible. Drawing her blades, Katarina swore the officer would die, no matter the cost. She leapt into battle, unleashing a whirlwind of steel. One by one blades flashed and guards fell, each strike bringing her one step closer to the officer. A final thrown dagger restored her honor. Bloody and bruised, Katarina barely escaped the Demacian forces, and returned to Noxus a changed woman. The scar she earned that night now serves as a constant reminder that she must never let passion interfere with duty.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøº''Never question my loyalty. You will never know what I endure for it.''ºøºøºøº
º-- Katarinaº
Katarina.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºDriven by an intense killer instinct, Katarina uses her talents as an assassin for the glory of Noxus, and the continued elevation of her family. While her fervor drives her to ever-greater feats, it can sometimes lead her ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºTry waiting until the other team is distracted with fighting your team, and use Shunpo to teleport into the fray and unleash a devastating Death Lotus.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøUsing Shunpo on an allied Champion, minion or ward can be a great escape tactic.øºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina's abilities deal magic damage, so even if she's building Attack Damage items, get magic resistance to counter her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøTry to save a disable for when Katarina uses her Death Lotus.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøBouncing Bladesº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºKatarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, dealing magic damage and marking them. Her next spell or basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark and deal additional magic damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøThrows a dagger dealing ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø magic damage. The dagger bounces to the 4 closest enemies dealing 10% less damage with each bounce.øºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøEnemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºø additional magic damage.ºøº

spells.name: ºøSinister Steelº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina whirls her daggers around her, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøWhirls daggers in a circle dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains øºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº% movement speed for 1 second.ºøº

spells.name: Shunpoº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºKatarina instantly moves to her target's location and takes reduced damage from enemies for a few seconds. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøMoves to a target's location. Deals ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage if the target is an enemy.øºøº

ºøºøAfter using Shunpo, Katarina takes ºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% reduced damage for øº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºDeath Lotusº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at up to three nearby Champions. Daggers deal magic damage and reduce incoming healing on targets hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøBecomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage over 2 seconds.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøDaggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing incoming healing by 50% for 3 seconds.øºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºVoracityº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºChampion kills or assists reduce Katarina's cooldowns by 15 seconds.ºøºøºøº

Kayle.name: Kayleº
Kayle.title: ºøThe Judicatorº
Kayle.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn a world far away where an ancient war still rages, Kayle was a great hero - the strongest of an immortal race committed to destroying evil wherever it could be found. For ten thousand years, Kayle fought tirelessly for her people, wielding her flaming sword forged before time itself. She shielded her delicate features beneath her enchanted armor, the sole remaining masterpiece of an extinct race of craftsmen. Though a beautiful, striking creature, Kayle, now as then, avoids showing her face; war has taken a terrible toll upon her spirit. In her quest for victory, she sometimes would try to lift the wicked up from their morass of evil, but more than often she instead purged those she herself deemed beyond redemption. To Kayle, justice can so often be an ugly thing.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTen years ago, Kayle's war against evil was nearly won... until her rebellious sister Morgana, a pariah amongst their people, suddenly gained powerful new allies: magicians of a hitherto unknown world called Runeterra. Morgana traded servitude to a number of the summoners in Runeterra's League of Legends for powerful new abilities that, if mastered, threatened to bring Kayle and her people to their knees. To save her world, Kayle had no choice but to make a pact with the League herself. She approached the leader of the League, High Counselor Reginald Ashram, with a deal of her own. In exchange for a thousand years of Kayle's service, Ashram halted all League interference on Kayle's world. With Ashram's disappearance five years ago, Kayle has new causes on Valoran: find out who or what caused Ashram to disappear, defeat her sister Morgana upon the Fields of Justice, and bring her own brand of justice to the League of Legends.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''In the League of Legends, Justice comes on swift wings.''øºøºøº
Kayle.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn a world far away where an ancient war still rages, Kayle was a great hero - the strongest of an immortal race committed to destroying evil wherever it could be found.  ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøº*Using Intervention on a high-DPS ally can turn the tides of battle by giving your ally free reign to attack. ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºø*Kayle can effectively do large amounts of damage or support her allies depending on her item build.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºø*Kayle benefits greatly from attack damage and ability power, making hybrid items like Malady and Trinity Force very effective on her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøIf you wish to support your allies, items like Aegis of the Legion and Shurelya's Reverie can help you assist teammates.øºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºø*Intervention only grants Kayle or her allies immunity to damage. Slows and stuns can still be applied, so trap them if they're being over zealous.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøº*Kayle is usually a fragile target. Once you see her ultimate cast switch to attacking her.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºø*Be sure to look at what items Kayle is building to determine what role she is fulfilling on her team.øºøºøºøºøº

spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøBlesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e3 }}ºøº seconds and healing them for ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})º health.º

spells.name: ºøRighteous Furyº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøIgnites Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged splash attack and bonus magic damage.øºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøKayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and her basic attack deals an additional ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage ºon hit.º

ºøºøIn addition, enemies near her target take øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº% of her Attack Damage plus ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage ººon attack.º

spells.name: ºInterventionº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøShields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøBathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºHoly Fervorº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resistance for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Kennen.name: Kennenº
Kennen.title: ºøthe Heart of the Tempestºøº
Kennen.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance. Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of the universe. This order is known as the Kinkou and it employs a triumvirate of shadow warriors to uphold its causes in the world. Kennen is one of these shadow warriors, entrusted with the sacred duty of Coursing the Sun - tirelessly conveying the justice of the Kinkou.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKennen was born in Bandle City and it was said that in his first living moments he bolted first from the womb and second from the midwife who delivered him. His parents had thought that he would outgrow his boundless energy, but as he matured his energy found no limits and was matched only by his unnerving speed. Despite his astonishing gifts, he remained unnoticed (or at least uncaught, as he was quite the prankster) until, on a dare, he ran straight up the great outer wall of the Placidium. When word of this feat reached Kinkou ears, Kennen was quickly and quietly brought in for an audience. He found that the role of the Heart of the Tempest suited him, frenetically delivering both the word and the punishments of the Kinkou across the realm. He now works with his fellows Akali and Shen to enforce the balance of Valoran. This hallowed pursuit has unsurprisingly led the triumvirate to the Fields of Justice.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The Heart of the Tempest beats eternal...and those beaten remember eternally.''øºøºøºøº
Kennen.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance. Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of the ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøYou can stun your opponents by inflicting 3 Marks of the Storm upon them.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøLightning Rush can be used to initiate fights with its Energy return component, allowing him to use other abilities afterward.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºYou can land an initial Mark of the Storm debuff on an opponent with Thundering Shuriken, and then add to it with Electrical Surge.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøConsider playing a bit more cautiously around Kennen when you have a Mark of the Storm debuff.  If he hits you with 3 Marks of the Storm, you will get stunned.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºKennen is flimsy by nature - turn and attack him if he gets careless with Lightning Rush.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøThundering Shurikenøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºKennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøThrows a shuriken that damages the first enemy it hits for øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and adds a Mark of the Storm.ºøºøº

spells.tooltip:
ºPassive:ººøºøºø Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals magic damage equal to ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºø% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.ºøºøºøº

Active:ººøºøºøºø Surges electricity through all nearby targets afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and adding another mark.øºøº

spells.name: ºøLightning Rushº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units.  Any enemy unit he runs through takes damage and gets a Mark of the Storm.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøKennen moves very fast and may pass through units, dealing øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøº magic damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds. øºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKennen is refunded 40 Energy if he passes through an enemy, but can only gain this effect once. Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSlicing Maelstromº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºKennen summons a storm that strikes at random nearby enemy champions for magical damage.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøSummons a magical storm that deals ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøº magic damage and applies a Mark of the Storm to a random enemy champion near Kennen every ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø seconds. This storm attacks up to ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø times and cannot hit the same target more than 3 times.ºøºøº

passive.name: ºøMark of the Stormº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKennen's abilities add Marks of the Storm to opponents for 6 seconds.  Upon receiving 3 Marks of Storm, an opponent is stunned and Kennen receives 25 Energy.  Has a diminished effect if done twice within 7 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Khazix.name: Kha'Zixº
Khazix.title: ºøthe Voidreaverº
Khazix.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºA vicious Void predator, Kha'Zix infiltrated Valoran to devour the land's most promising creatures. With each kill he absorbs his prey's strength, evolving to grow more powerful. Kha'Zix hungers most to conquer and consume Rengar, the one beast he considers his equal.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen Kha'Zix crossed over into this world, he was fragile and ravenous. The animals he first encountered were too small to fuel the rapid evolution he craved. Kha'Zix focused his hunger on the most dangerous creatures he could find, risking his life to satisfy his need. With each kill he feasted and changed, becoming a stronger, faster predator. Kha'Zix soon chased his prey with unrestrained aggression, believing he was unstoppable. One day, while savoring a fresh kill, the predator became the prey. From cover a creature pounced in a blur of fangs and steel, tackling him to the ground. It roared in his face slashing and clawing, and Kha'Zix felt his blood spill for the first time. Screeching in fury, he sliced at the brute's eye driving it back. They fought from sunset to sunrise. Finally, near death, they reluctantly separated. As his wounds closed, Kha'Zix burned with anticipation at the idea of devouring one who could match the Void's strength. He resumed his search for powerful prey with renewed vigor. Someday, Kha'Zix will feast on Rengar.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºø''Kill. Consume. Adapt.''ºøº
º-- Kha'Zixº

allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEnemies are considered isolated if they have no allies within a short distance. The damage of Taste Their Fear is massively increased against these targets.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUnseen Threat activates when Kha'zix cannot be seen by the enemy team. Reactivate by using brush or Void Assault. Don't forget to apply Unseen Threat by autoattacking enemy champions.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºKha'Zix has a great deal of freedom to choose where and when to fight. Pick your battles carefully to succeed.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTaste Their Fear deals bonus damage to targets that are isolated.  Gain an advantage by fighting near allied minions, champions, or turrets.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøLeap and Void Assault have long cooldowns. Kha'Zix is very vulnerable when these are not available.øºøºøºøºøº

Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

KogMaw.name: Kog'Mawº
KogMaw.title: ºøthe Mouth of the Abyssøº
KogMaw.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhen the prophet Malzahar was reborn in Icathia, he was led there by an ominous voice which thereafter anchored itself to his psyche. From within, this voice bestowed upon him terrible purpose, and though Malzahar was no longer tormented by its call, the voice did not cease its unrelenting summons. This baleful beacon's gentle flicker -- now fastened to Runeterra -- drew forth a putrid beast that ambled across a threshold it did not understand, widening a fissure between the spaces which were never meant to meet. There amongst the haunting ruins of Icathia, Kog'Maw manifested in Valoran with unsettling curiosity. The spark which led him to Runeterra teased him still, urging him gently towards Malzahar. It also encouraged him to familiarize himself with his new environment, to the stark horror of everything he encountered on his journey.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe enchanting colors and aromas of Runeterra intoxicated Kog'Maw, and he explored the fruits of the strange world the only way he knew how: by devouring them. At first he sampled only the wild flora and fauna he happened across. As he traversed the parched Tempest Flats, however, he came upon a tribe of nomads. Seemingly unhampered by conventional rules of physics, Kog'Maw consumed every nomad and any obstacles they put in his way, amounting to many times his own mass and volume. The most composed of his victims may have had time to wonder if this was due to the caustic enzymes which stung the ground as they dripped from his gaping mouth, although such musings were abruptly concluded. When his wake of catastrophe reached the Institute of War, an enthusiastic Malzahar greeted him with an enticing prospect: taste the best Runeterra could offer...on the Fields of Justice.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº'If that's just hungry, I don't want to see angry.'ºøºøº
ºøºø-- Tryndamere, the Barbarian Kingºøº

ºøºøMake the most out of your Icathian Surprise.ºøºøº

ºøºøºThe range on Living Artillery increases each rank.ºøºøº

spells.name: ºøCaustic Spittleº

ºøºøºøºøºFires a living artillery shot from a great distance that lands shortly after launch. Deals ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage and reveals enemies for 4 seconds (deals ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøº% bonus damage to Champions).ºøº

Leblanc.name: LeBlancº
Leblanc.title: ºthe Deceiverº
Leblanc.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEvery city has its dark side, even one whose reputation is already of a questionable hue. Noxus - though its name is already invoked with a mixture of reverence and revulsion - is no exception to this simple truth. Deep within the winding dungeons that honeycomb the earth beneath its dark, meandering streets lies the real underbelly of this sprawling metropolis, a haven for all manner of malevolence. Amongst the cults, covens, and secret societies that call this labyrinth their home, LeBlanc, the Deceiver, presides over the Black Rose, a remnant from a lost, yet similarly unscrupulous time in Noxian history. Ruthless and seemingly ageless, LeBlanc and her ilk were a mainstay in Noxian political affairs during the era before the militarization of the Noxian government. In those days, this guild of powerful magicians met in secret to further their hidden agenda, and to hone a craft more subtle than that preferred by those currently in power.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhile their exact motives have always remained mysterious, it was widely believed that the Black Rose was the true power behind the throne while the aristocracy still reigned in Noxus. When raw martial prowess became the ultimate determination of whose will held sway in the Empire, the Black Rose seemed to vanish overnight. Many believed that perhaps their time had simply passed, and that its members had put aside their quests for social and political dominance. When LeBlanc reemerged at the gates of the Institute of War, however, it became clear that these masters of shadow and flame had simply been biding their time, waiting for a new global authority to emerge: the League of Legends.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''The world is very different for those who cannot see beyond what is placed before their very eyes.''øºøºøºøºøº
ºø-- LeBlanc, the Deceiverºøº
Leblanc.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEvery city has its dark side, even one whose reputation is already of a questionable hue. Noxus - though its name is already invoked with a mixture of ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøDistortion allows you to be aggressive with your other spells while being able to return to safety.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøUsing Distortion can help your positioning to land Ethereal Chains.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøYou can chain Sigil of Silence and Ethereal Chains to prevent characters with blink from escaping for up to 4 seconds.øºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøStunning or silencing LeBlanc will prevent her from activating the return part of Distortion.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøStay behind minions to make Ethereal Chains difficult to land and force her to use Distortion in a suboptimal manner.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSigil of Silenceº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºLeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the sigil will trigger, dealing damage and silencing the target.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
Deals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº magic damage and marks the target for 3.5 seconds.ºøºøº

spells.tooltip:
ºøºøMove to a target location, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage to nearby units.ºøº

If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and slow their movement speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøIf the target remains shackled for ºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø seconds they take an additional ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and are unable to move for øºøº{{ e2 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºMirror Imageº
passive.description:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 0.5 seconds. When the invisibility fades, she creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøMirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøMirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.ºøºøºøºøº

LeeSin.name: Lee Sinº
LeeSin.title: ºøthe Blind Monkº
LeeSin.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAs a young teen, Lee Sin was intent on becoming a summoner. His will and dedication were unmatched by any of his peers, and his skill drew the attention of Reginald Ashram, the League's High Councilor at the time. While studying at the Arcanum Majoris, Lee Sin became frustrated with instruction paced for the other students. He spent his free time researching the nuances of summoning in hopes of graduating sooner. He made amazing advances in his arcane studies, surpassing all other students. By all indications, he would have become one of the League's greatest summoners were it not for one terrible mistake. Too impatient, he attempted to test his ability by summoning a beast from the Plague Jungles. What he summoned instead was a young boy, but not in one piece. He barely had time to look the boy in what was once his face before the jumbled human mass fell lifeless to the floor. A League investigation later revealed that the boy's entire village was obliterated by feedback from the ritual.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLee Sin's talents were so promising that the League was willing to overlook the incident, but he could never forgive himself. He left the Institute and journeyed to the Shojin Monastery for eternal repentance, swearing never to practice magic again. Years later, hoping to atone for his crime with martyrdom, he set himself ablaze as a protest of the Noxian occupation of Ionia. He remained alive in this state, enduring searing agony for weeks. His actions paved the way for a League match wherein Ionia prevailed, but by the time he was doused, his eyes had been burned completely from their sockets. Hailed as a savior, he was reborn, and his will to act invigorated. He joined the League of Legends to continue his atonement with sweat and blood, a true monk's only possessions.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The actions of one may sunder the world, but the efforts of many may rebuild it.''ºøºøºøºøº
º-- Lee Sinº
LeeSin.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAs a young teen, Lee Sin was intent on becoming a summoner. His will and dedication were unmatched by any of his peers, and his skill drew the ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøUse Sonic Wave before Dragon's Rage so you can chase the target with Resonating Strike.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºTake advantage of Flurry by weaving in basic attacks between spell casts -- this maximizes damage output and minimizes Energy loss.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøSelf-casting Safeguard and using Iron Will are powerful tools for killing neutral monsters (in the jungle).ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøStay spread out to minimize the impact of Lee Sin's ultimate, Dragon's Rage.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøLee Sin has powerful tools to combat physical damage in Iron Will and Cripple but he is still vulnerable to magic damage.øºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLee Sin relies heavily on following up with his abilities. Use disables to prevent him from chaining together his abilities and attacks.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøºSonic Wave / Resonating Strikeºøº
spells.description:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøResonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing health.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºSonic Wave: ººøºøºøºøLee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøº physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. ºøºøººøºøºøºøIf Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.øºøºøºøº

spells.tooltip:

spells.tooltip:

Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøLee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøºøºø physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: Flurryº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøAfter Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 15 Energy each.ºøºøºøºøºøº

Leona.name: Leonaº
Leona.title: ºøthe Radiant Dawnº
Leona.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºOn the upper slopes of Mount Targon, the warriors of Rakkor live and breathe only for war. However, Targon's peak is reserved for a special group of Rakkoran who answer to a ''higher'' calling. Members of this group, called the Solari, retire their mantles of war, choosing instead to devote their lives to reverence of the sun. According to legend, the Solari were formed by a warrior who could call the raw might of the sun down upon his enemies in combat. He claimed Mount Targon's summit, the point on Valoran closest to the sun, for his solar devotion, a tradition which generations of Solari have preserved to this day.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLeona's parents were traditional Rakkorans, both bred for the heat of battle. To them, Leona was a problem child. She was capable of fighting as fiercely as any other -- including her childhood friend, Pantheon -- but she did not share their zeal for killing. She believed that the true worth of a soldier lay in her ability to defend and protect. When it came time for her Rite of Kor, a ceremony in which two Rakkoran teens battle to the death for the right to bear a relic-weapon, Leona refused to fight. For this, the Rakkoran leaders ordered her execution, but when they tried to strike the fatal blow, sunlight burst forth, bathing Mount Targon in light. As it faded, Leona stood unharmed and her executioners lay unconscious around her. The Solari immediately claimed Leona, demanding that her sentence be repealed. She donned the golden armor of the Solari and they bestowed upon her the sword and shield passed down from the ancient sun-warriors of legend. The Solari helped Leona focus her abilities, and when she was ready she left to join the League of Legends.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The sun's rays reach all of Runeterra, so too must the image of its champion.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Leonaº
Leona.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºOn the upper slopes of Mount Targon, the warriors of Rakkor live and breathe only for war.  However, Targon's peak is reserved for a special group of Rakkoran who answer to a ''higher'' ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøLead the charge and mark your foes with Sunlight before your allies deal damage.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºShield of Daybreak and Zenith Blade form a powerful offensive combo.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºYou can absorb a huge amount of damage using Eclipse, but you must stay near enemies to gain the bonus duration.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøWhen Leona activates Eclipse, you have three seconds to get away from her before she deals damage.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøOnly foes in the center of Solar Flare get stunned, so you can often avoid this if you're quick.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøShield of Daybreakøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøLeona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøThe next basic attack deals an additional øºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and stuns an enemy for ºøº{{ e1 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: Eclipseº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLeona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resistance.  When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: Gains º{{ e2 }}ºøºø bonus Armor and Magic Resist for ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøº magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for ºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºZenith Bladeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLeona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøStrikes all enemies in a line dealing øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be briefly rooted and Leona will dash to them.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºSolar Flareº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLeona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area.  Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºCalls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing ºøºøº{{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and slowing enemies by ºøº{{ e1 }}% for º{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºø seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.ºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºSunlightº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøDamaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal additional magic damage.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Lissandra.name: ºLissandraº
Lissandra.title: ºøthe Ice Witchº
Lissandra.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze - she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The Ice Witch.'' The truth is much more sinister: Lissandra is a corruptor of nature who plots to unleash an ice age on the world.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøCenturies ago, Lissandra betrayed her tribe to evil creatures, known as the Frozen Watchers, in return for power. That was the last day that warm blood ran through her veins. With her corrupted tribesmen and the strength of the Watchers, she swept across the land like a terrible blizzard. As her empire spread, the world grew colder and ice choked the land. When the Watchers were defeated by ancient heroes, Lissandra did not lose faith and swore to prepare the world for their return.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºLissandra worked to purge all knowledge of the Watchers from the world. Using magic to take human form, she masqueraded as numerous seers and elders. Over the course of generations, she rewrote the stories of the Freljord, and so the history of its people changed. Today the fragmented retellings of the Watchers are seen as children's tales. But this deception wasn't enough - Lissandra also needed an army.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShe set her sights on the noble Frostguard tribe. Lissandra knew corrupting the Frostguard would take centuries, and so she launched her greatest deception. She murdered and stole the identity of the Frostguard leader. Then she slowly began to warp the tribe's proud traditions. When her human form grew old, she faked her own death and then murdered her successor to steal her identity. With each generation, the Frostguard grew more insular, cruel and twisted. Today, the world still sees them as a noble and peaceful tribe that guards against evil creatures like the Ice Witch. In truth, they now serve the witch and long for the glorious return of the Watchers.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøLissandra knows that on that day nations will fall and the world will be reborn in ice.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºø''Close your eyes and let the cold take you.'' ºøºøº
º-- Lissandraº
Lissandra.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze - she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøYou can instantly use your ultimate on yourself by pressing the self cast key and the ultimate key at once (alt+R by default).ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºCasting Glacial Path and then running in the opposite direction will leave your enemies uncertain which way you will actually go.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLissandra's abilities are shorter range than those of many mages. As a result, buying items that offer both ability power and defense, like Zhonya's Hourglass and Abyssal Scepter, can be a great choice to help her both survive and deal damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøThe best way to stop Lissandra from moving using her Glacial Path is to immobilize her before she reactivates it.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøLissandra's Ring of Frost has a long cooldown at early ranks; engage her while it's on cooldown.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºLissandra's Ice Shard only slows the first unit it hits. Approach Lissandra from behind your team's minions to avoid being slowed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºIce Shardº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThrows a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøThrows a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e3 }}% for º{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºøº seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºGlacial Pathº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºCasts an ice claw that deals ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøº magic damage to all enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºFrozen Tombº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøOn Enemy Cast: ººøºøFreezes target champion solid, stunning it for ºøºøº{{ e4 }}º seconds.º

ºøOn Self Cast: ººøºøLissandra encases herself in dark ice for øºøº{{ e5 }}ºøºøºøºø seconds, becoming untargetable and invulnerable but unable to take any actions.øºøºøºøº

ºøºøDark ice then emanates from the target dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}%.

passive.name: Icebornº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEvery 18 seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no mana. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Lucian.name: Lucianº
Lucian.title: ºthe Purifierº
Lucian.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºLucian wields relic weapons imbued with ancient power and stands a stalwart guardian against the undead. His cold conviction never wavers, even in the face of the maddening horrors he destroys beneath his hail of purifying fire. Lucian walks alone on a grim mission: to purge the spirits of those ensnared in undeath, his eternal beloved among them.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLike the twin relic weapons they wielded, Lucian and his wife Senna were carved from the same stone. Together they battled evil in Runeterra for years, bringing light to darkness and purging those taken by corruption. They were beacons of righteousness: Senna's dedication to their cause never faltered, while Lucian's kindness and warmth touched the hearts of the many lives they saved. Two parts of one whole, they were devoted and inseparable.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThough Lucian and Senna witnessed terror that would break most warriors, nothing they had seen compared to the horrors wrought by the Shadow Isles. When the spectral denizens of that accursed place began to manifest across Runeterra, Lucian and Senna hunted them down wherever they appeared. It was grim work, but the fearless pair prevailed until one tragic encounter with the soul-collector Thresh. Lucian and Senna had faced such nightmarish undead before, but never one so deviously clever and cruel. As the terrible battle unfolded, Thresh sprung an unexpected ploy. To Lucian's horror, the creature tricked Senna and ensnared her soul, trapping her in a spectral prison. Nothing could bring her back. Senna was lost, and for the first time, Lucian faced his mission alone. øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThough the Warden had taken half of Lucian's heart, he had also created the Shadow Isles' most dangerous foe. Lucian became a man of dark determination, one who would stop at nothing to purge the undead from the face of Runeterra. In honor of Senna's memory, he took up her fallen weapon and vowed to see their mission through to the end. Now wielding both relic weapons, Lucian fights to slay the undead and cleanse the souls of the Shadow Isles. He knows that Senna's soul is lost, but never loses hope that one day he will bring her peace. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''Be grateful. By slaying you now, I spare you an eternity of torment.'' ºøºøºøº
º -- Lucianº
Lucian.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºLucian wields relic weapons imbued with ancient power and stands a stalwart guardian against the undead. His cold conviction never wavers, even in the face of the maddening horrors he destroys beneath his hail of ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøFor optimal burst, try to combine Relentless Pursuit into Piercing Light.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøArdent Blaze actually explodes in a star pattern. Try to line it up so the spokes hit enemy champions.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºOnce you have chosen an angle for The Culling, you cannot change it. Pick your moment well!ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøBecause of Lightslinger, Lucian benefits more from Attack Damage than he does from Attack Speed.ºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøLucian has strong burst, but little sustained damage.ºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøLucian cannot change the aim of The Culling. Take advantage of this by avoiding the angle of the bullets.ºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPiercing Light does not give Lucian extra Attack Range. He still needs to find a target in range to line up his shot. Avoid Piercing Light by anticipating the angle Lucian will choose.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøPiercing Lightº

spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøShoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}ºøºøºøº% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. Deals 75% damage to minions.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºArdent Blazeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºLucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøFires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals øºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }})ºøºø magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.ºøºøº

ºøºøDamaging marked targets grants Lucian øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº Movement Speed for 2 seconds.ºøº

spells.name: ºøRelentless Pursuitøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøLucian dashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.øºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºDashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøIf The Culling kills an enemy champion, the cooldown of Relentless Pursuit is reset.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºThe Cullingº

spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøLucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøº seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }})ºøºøºøºø physical damage. The number of shots scales with his Attack Speed. Total over øºøºøºøº{{ f2 }}º shots: º{{ f1 }}ºøºøºø physical damage. The Culling does 400% damage to minions.øºøºøº

ºøºøºøLucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.ºøºøº

ºøºøReactivate The Culling to cancel early.øºøº

passive.name: ºLightslingerº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºWhenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.ºøºøºøº

Lulu.name: Luluº
Lulu.title: ºøthe Fae Sorceressº
Lulu.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPerhaps more than any other champion in the League, Lulu marches to the beat of her own drum. During her youth in Bandle City, she spent most of her time wandering alone in the forest or lost in a daydream. It wasn't that she was antisocial; the day-to-day bustle of Bandle City just couldn't compete with the vibrant world of her imagination. She saw wonder in places most people overlooked. This was how she found Pix, a fae spirit, pretending to be stuck in a birdhouse. Lulu's imagination distinguished her to Pix and he seized the opportunity to lure her into his world. He brought her to the Glade, the enchanted home of the fae, which lay nestled in a clearing in the woods. There the rigid properties of the outside world - things like size and color - changed as frequently and whimsically as the direction of the wind. Lulu felt at home in the Glade and she lingered there with Pix, fascinated by this secret place.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShe quickly lost track of time. Her life in the Glade was comfortable and natural. She and Pix played fae games together, the sorts of games that she had been told were ''make believe''... and she got exceedingly good at them. It caught her by surprise when she suddenly remembered that she had left a life behind in Bandle City. The Glade had a way of making everything outside seem distant and surreal. Lulu decided to revisit her former home, to share some of the lovely things she'd learned, but when she and Pix returned the world had changed. Time, she discovered, was another property that behaved differently in the Glade, and centuries had passed while she was away. Lulu sought to reconnect to the residents of the outside world but her attempts had unfortunate results. She led all the children off to play hide and seek, temporarily changing them into flowers and animals to spice up the game, but their parents didn't appreciate her efforts. When the yordles insisted that she leave their land, she turned to a vibrant magical place where those with unusual gifts were not just accepted but adored: the League of Legends.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''The best path between two points is upside-down, between, then inside-out and round again.''ºøºøºøºøº
-- Luluº
Lulu.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPerhaps more than any other champion in the League, Lulu marches to the beat of her own drum. During her youth in Bandle City, she spent most of her time ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºGlitterlance can be fired at odd angles depending on where your cursor is - Moving your cursor closer to Pix and Lulu will change your area of effect size considerably.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºConsider casting Whimsy on Mages for the AP boost, Help, Pix! on ranged attackers for the Pix boost and Wild Growth on Tanks or Fighters for the added initiation power.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøThe shots from Lulu's faerie can be intercepted - hide behind your minions to avoid the additional Faerie attacks.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLulu excels when opponents heavily commit. Don't give her this chance! Use heavy harass tactics instead to force Lulu and her partner out of lane.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºGlitterlanceº

spells.tooltip:
ºøºøLulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage, slowing enemies hit by øºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e3 }}ºøºø second(s). This slow decays over time.øºøº

ºøºøAn enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.øºøº

spells.name: Whimsyº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf cast on an ally, grants them movement speed and ability power for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøOn Ally Cast: ººøTarget ally gains øº{{ e1 }}ºø% Movement Speed and øº{{ e2 }}ºø Ability Power for øº{{ e5 }}º seconds.º

ºøOn Enemy Cast: ººøºøPolymorphs an enemy champion for ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøºøºø seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base movement speed by øºøºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}.

spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøOn Ally Cast: ººøºøºøºøºCommands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºø seconds. Upon arrival, Pix shields them from ºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+º{{ a1 }})º damage for º{{ e1 }}º seconds.º

ºøOn Enemy Cast: ººPix deals º{{ e4 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants vision of them for ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºWild Growthº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºLulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøLulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For ºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø seconds, her ally gains ºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºø bonus health and slows nearby enemies by øºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºøPix, Faerie Companionøº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøPix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.ºøºøºøºøºøº

Lux.name: Luxº
Lux.title: ºøthe Lady of Luminosityøº
Lux.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBorn to the prestigious Crownguards, the paragon family of Demacian service, Luxanna was destined for greatness. She grew up as the family's only daughter, and she immediately took to the advanced education and lavish parties required of families as high profile as the Crownguards. As Lux matured, it became clear that she was extraordinarily gifted. She could play tricks that made people believe they had seen things that did not actually exist. She could also hide in plain sight. Somehow, she was able to reverse engineer arcane magical spells after seeing them cast only once. She was hailed as a prodigy, drawing the affections of the Demacian government, military, and citizens alike.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAs one of the youngest women to be tested by the College of Magic, she was discovered to possess a unique command over the powers of light. The young Lux viewed this as a great gift, something for her to embrace and use in the name of good. Realizing her unique skills, the Demacian military recruited and trained her in covert operations. She quickly became renowned for her daring achievements; the most dangerous of which found her deep in the chambers of the Noxian High Command. She extracted valuable inside information about the Noxus-Ionian conflict, earning her great favor with Demacians and Ionians alike. However, reconnaissance and surveillance was not for her. A light of her people, Lux's true calling was the League of Legends, where she could follow in her brother's footsteps and unleash her gifts as an inspiration for all of Demacia.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøº ''Her guiding light makes enemies wary, but they should worry most when the light fades.''ºøºøºøºøº
ºøº -- Garen, The Might of Demaciaºøº
Lux.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBorn to the prestigious Crownguards,  the paragon family of Demacian service, Luxanna was destined for greatness.  She grew up as the family's only daughter, and she immediately ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºLux has great zone control abilities. Try to set up Lucent Singularity to prevent an enemy's advance or escape.ºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf you have trouble landing Prismatic Barrier, remember that it returns to you after it reaches max range.  Try positioning yourself to hit your allies with its return trip.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøLucent Singularity is a great scouting tool. Try throwing it into brush before walking into it to check for ambushes.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLux has powerful zone control abilities.  Try to spread out and attack from different directions so she cannot lock down a specific area.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen retreating with low health, be prepared to dodge Lux's Final Spark, a red targeting beam fires prior to the main beam, so try to move to the side if possible.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøLight Bindingº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøLux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøFires a ball of light, rooting the first enemy hit for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºø seconds and dealing øº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage. The second enemy receives øºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% of the effect.º

spells.name: ºøPrismatic Barrierº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøLux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøºThrows Lux's wand to a target location and back, protecting herself and all allied Champions it touches from ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø damage for 3 seconds.øº

spells.name: ºøLucent Singularityøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøCreates a zone that slows enemies by ºøº{{ e1 }}º%. After º{{ e3 }}ºøºø seconds the zone detonates dealing ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

ºøºøActivate again to detonate early.ºøº

spells.name: ºFinal Sparkº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºAfter gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area.  In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøChannels a dazzling ray of light dealing øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff. øºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºIlluminationº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøLux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds.  Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Malphite.name: ºMalphiteº
Malphite.title: ºøShard of the Monolithøº
Malphite.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere is a world of perfect harmony, where all are part of the whole. The Monolith is the essence of all creation, and its denizens are but singular pieces of it. It is beautiful in its symmetry, and in its almost complete lack of uncertainty. The rocky beings that live there know their place and work to fulfill their duties to the fullest extent, functioning almost as a superorganism or hive. Malphite has always strived to live up to his full potential, as his own personal part of the whole, serving the role of a distinguished creature questing to enforce his people's flawless vision of order.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOne day, without warning, a dimensional rift opened, and he was summoned across the cosmos to the world of Runeterra. The transition was painful and terrifying for him, as he was cut off from the song of his people and the Monolith - things that had been ever-present in him since the day he was born. He raged, trapped in the Summoning Circle, as those who had called him made their plea. Runeterra was a world that had nearly been consumed by its disharmony. It was a world that needed champions to bring order out of chaos. It was to that end that the rock-creature was summoned, so that he could aid them in this quest. Looking past his own fear and apprehension, Malphite could see that this was a respectable goal, and one in which he could participate - perhaps uniquely so. Today, as part of the League of Legends, he hammers those who would seek to upset Valoran's movement toward order, especially turning his attention to those that wield chaotic magic. Unfortunately, Malphite has also begun to change, as he has been forced to face his own profound loneliness among the world's vibrant individuality.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøBeware, minions of chaos! The Shard of the Monolith has come.øºøºøº
Malphite.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere is a world of perfect harmony, where all are part of the whole. The Monolith is the essence of all creation, and its denizens are but singular pieces of it. It is beautiful in its ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøArmor reduces the rate that attacks go through Granite Shield. Activate Brutal Strikes before an enemy can destroy the shield to minimize your damage intake.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøDespite his abilities scaling on Armor, some games require Malphite to get Magic Resist. When those games occur, try getting Aegis of the Legion, Mercury's Treads, and Guardian Angel.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf you're a physical damage character stay behind your allies when fighting Malphite. Ground Slam can significantly reduce your damage output.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºMalphite is one of a couple tanks who are capable of jungling. Watch out if he gets Smite.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSeismic Shardº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºUsing his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing movement speed for 4 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: Deals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage and steals ºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø% Movement Speed from the target for ºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºøBrutal Strikesº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMalphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Activating Brutal Strikes greatly increases his Armor and Attack Damage for a short amount of time.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºøMalphite's basic attacks hit units near his target for ºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºø% of his Attack Damage.ºøº

ºActive: ººøºøMalphite's Armor and Attack Damage increase by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºGround Slamº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMalphite slams the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack speed of enemies for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøMalphite slams the ground dealing ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }})ºøºøºøº magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}% for º{{ e4 }}º seconds.º

ºøºøThis ability gains damage equal to ºøº{{ e3 }}ºø% of Malphite's Armor.øº

spells.name: ºøUnstoppable Forceº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºMalphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºMalphite charges toward the target area, dealing ºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºøGranite Shieldº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMalphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Malzahar.name: ºMalzaharº
Malzahar.title: ºøthe Prophet of the Voidºøº
Malzahar.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºMany men have gone mad beneath the glare of the Shurima sun, but it was during the night's chilling embrace that Malzahar relinquished his sanity. Malzahar was born a seer, blessed with the gift of prophecy. His talent, though unrefined, promised to be one of Runeterra's greatest boons, but destiny plotted him another course; his sensitivity to the roiling tides of fate allowed other, unwelcome things to tug at his subconscious mind. In his dreams, where the veil of separation is thinnest, a sinister thing beckoned. For some time, Malzahar was able to resist its prodding solicitation, but with each passing night the voice grew louder, or perhaps deeper, until he could withstand the call no more.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºHe ventured into the desert without supplies, drawn by the lure of a specious charm. His destination: a lost civilization to the east, known to ancient texts as Icathia. Few believed such a place ever existed, and those who did were certain that the sands had long since devoured whatever remained. When Malzahar's cracked feet finally failed him, he found himself kneeling at the base of a bizarre crumbling obelisk. Beyond it lay the alien geometry of a ruined city and the giant decaying idols of dark and horrific gods. His eyes, seeing what others cannot, and what none should, were filled with the essence of the Void. His once shifting visions of the future were replaced with the immutable promise of Valoran beset by creatures of the Void. Standing alone, but not alone, amidst the echoing dunes, he noticed the familiar voice escape his own lips in a parched rasp, bearing three words whose weight trembled his knees. League of Legends. Now infused with the power of the void itself, Malzahar set off to the north to seek his fate.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The land may melt, the sea may swell, the sky may fall... but They will come.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Malzaharº
Malzahar.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºMany men have gone mad beneath the glare of the Shurima sun, but it was during the night's chilling embrace that Malzahar relinquished his sanity.  Malzahar was born a seer, ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºDon't be afraid of spamming skills to get your Voidlings into action.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøLay down a Null Zone before using Nether Grasp to maximize damage.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøNull Zone is extremely potent against high HP neutral monsters. Try using this to get the blue buff from the Ancient Golem.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºVoidlings have a limited lifespan of 21 seconds.ºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøAvoid minion waves that have been affected by Malefic Visions. You never know when they may die and pass the Visions onto you.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøMalzahar can be difficult to 1v1 if he has his ultimate up. Make sure you have enough health to survive a round of his spells.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøCall of the Voidº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMalzahar opens up two portals to the void.  After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal magic damage and silence enemy champions.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøMalzahar opens two portals to the void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and silence champions for øºøº{{ e2 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºNull Zoneº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøMalzahar creates a zone of negative energy which damages enemies that stand in it.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøMalzahar creates a zone of negative energy for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø seconds. The zone damages nearby enemies for ºøºøº{{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%)ºøºøºø of their max health each second (damage to Monsters is capped at ºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø damage per second).øº

spells.name: ºøMalefic Visionsº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMalzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage each second. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains mana.  Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøMalzahar infects his target's mind, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage over 4 seconds.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøºIf the target dies during this time, the visions pass to a nearby enemy and Malzahar gains ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} mana.º

ºøºøºøMalzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.ºøºøº

spells.name: ºNether Graspº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøMalzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion and deal damage each second.øºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøMalzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress target champion, dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage over 2.5 seconds.ºøº

passive.name: ºøSummon Voidlingº
passive.description:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAfter casting 4 spells, Malzahar summons an uncontrollable Voidling to engage enemy units for 21 seconds. Voidlings have 200 + 50 x lvl Health and 20 + 5 x lvl Damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøVoidlings Grow after 7 seconds (+50% Damage/Armor), and Frenzy after 14 seconds (+100% Attack Speed).øºøºøºøºøº

Maokai.name: Maokaiº
Maokai.title: ºøthe Twisted Treantøº
Maokai.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe twisting magical energies unleashed by mages during the Rune Wars caused an incredible amount of devastation to the natural world. The League was established to control the use of this magic by confining it to the Fields of Justice. By limiting its use to there, they thought that they could prevent it from doing further harm to the environment. It seemed that they were successful until Maokai came into being. During a League match on The Twisted Treeline, Maokai, an ancient oak that stood above the upper jungle, spontaneously roared to life. Ripped from the natural balance by arcane forces, his sentience was forged in chaos. Before the Adjudicators of the League could step in and suppress him, he slew all six champions participating in the match. The scholars of the Arcanum Majoris took a keen interest in him, as they were eager to discover the secrets of his animation.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøMaokai was furious, however. He abhorred the existence that was thrust upon him; he felt it was a corruption of nature. He learned to communicate with people in hopes of finding a way to be returned to his former, true state. Seizing the opportunity, the League offered a trade. They would research a way to revert him so long as he agreed to fight in the League of Legends. Maokai was indifferent to verdicts rendered by the League, but he was eager to punish summoners for their wanton use of magic. He agreed to the terms under one condition: once they learned how to turn him back, they would never animate another tree again. He wears a lantern on the Fields of Justice to set him apart from the other trees, and as a warning to the animals that would do him harm.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº''I will use this power until I am free of it.''ºøºøº
º-- Maokaiº

allytips: ºøºøºøºøºSaplings can be tossed into brush or over terrain to gain line of sight on your enemies.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøSave Vengeful Maelstrom for after your opponents have fully committed to a fight.øºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRanking up Arcane Smash and Twisted Advance gives Maokai powerful crowd control moves, while ranking up Sapling Toss will improve your damage output and ability to farm.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøSaplings can be avoided by placing friendly minions between yourself and them. You can also just outrun them if you're fast.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøVengeful Maelstrom does more damage if you attack Maokai or his allies within the area of effect.  Stay out of the area to avoid the damage.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøMaokai will avoid taking damage while he's using Twisted Advance, so don't waste your spells.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºArcane Smashº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºMaokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøMaokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take øºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and are slowed by ºøº{{ e3 }}ºø% for 2 seconds.º

spells.name: ºøTwisted Advanceº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøMaokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies.  He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøMaokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, deals ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and roots it for ºøº{{ e2 }}º second(s).º

spells.name: ºSapling Tossº
