passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºRammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his armor into Attack Damage.ºøºøºøºøºøº

Renekton.name: ºRenektonº
Renekton.title: ºøthe Butcher of the Sandsºøº
Renekton.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn a faraway world, Renekton was born a member of a race of bestial guardians created to serve as the rulers and protectors of their people. Alongside his brother Nasus, Renekton oversaw the upkeep of the Great Library, which served as both a vault of ancient knowledge and the repository of the teachings of the Cycle of Life and Death. While the enlightened Nasus taught those scholars who came to study, Renekton served as the Great Library's gatekeeper. He could sense the true natures of those who sought Nasus' teachings, and he sent away those with dark ambitions. Over time, however, his repeated exposure to this evil infected his mind. He grew furious with the malevolence in the hearts of men, and as he descended deeper into madness, he discovered he could quell the fury by cutting the evil from the men who possessed it. Unfortunately, the relief was as short-lived as the subjects, and the ''butcher's rage'', as it came to be known, would resurge even stronger.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøConsumed by his anger, Renekton turned on the one being who could defeat him -- his own brother. Nasus pleaded with Renekton to see reason. Realizing that he was beyond redemption, the despondent Nasus valiantly struck down his wayward sibling. Defenseless, Renekton waited eagerly for death's release. It never came. He was spared when summoners from the League of Legends claimed his brother. Caught in the wake of this powerful spell, Renekton tumbled for what seemed like ages between realities. When he finally emerged, he fell deep into the sewers of Zaun. Insane with fury, Renekton languished in his newfound home, driven senseless by his rage. That is until, by happenstance, he caught a familiar scent in the air. Believing that the familiar scent would guide him to the solace that was fading from his memory, he traced his brother to the Institute of War.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''My brother has become hollow. Full of rage, but empty.''øºøºøº
ºøºø-- Nasus, the Curator of the Sands.ºøº
Renekton.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn a faraway world, Renekton was born a member of a race of bestial guardians created to serve as the rulers and protectors of their people. Alongside ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøSlice and Dice excels at harassing maneuvers. Slice in, follow up with another skill and then Dice back out to safety.øºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºCull the Meek drains an enormous amount of life when used in the middle of the fray. You can use this to bait opponents into thinking you are weaker than you really are.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøCooldown reduction is especially good for Renekton, allowing him to both quickly build up and use his Fury.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøPay close attention to Renekton's Fury gauge as that will usually signify when he is about to attack.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKeeping Renekton from being able to fight and gain Fury by continually harassing him will severely reduce the effectiveness of his abilities.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøCull the Meekº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRenekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøRenekton swings his blade, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø physical damage to nearby enemies and gains 5% of the damage dealt as Health (20% for champions), up to ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø. Enemy champions heal for 4x as much. øºøº

ºø50 Fury Bonus:ººø Damage increased to øº{{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }})ºøºø. Heal percent increased to 10%, up to øºøº{{ e3 }}.

spells.name: ºøRuthless Predatorº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRenekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøRenekton's next attack strikes twice, dealing ºøºøº{{ f1 }}ºø physical damage (øº{{ e3 }} + º{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºø% of his Attack Damage) and stuns for 0.75 seconds. Each hit applies on-hit effects.ºøºøºøºøº

ºø50 Fury Bonus:ººøºøº Instead, Renekton attacks three times, dealing ºøºøº{{ f2 }}ºø physical damage (øº{{ e4 }} + º{{ e1 }}ºøºøºø% of his Attack Damage) and stuns his target for 1.5 seconds. øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSlice and Diceº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºRenekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the armor of units hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
Slice:ººø Renekton dashes, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºø physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.øºøºøºøº

ºøDice - 50 Fury Bonus:øººø Damage increased to øº{{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }})ºø. Enemies hit have øº{{ e2 }}ºøº% reduced Armor for 4 seconds. ºøº

spells.name: Dominusº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRenekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºRenekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøº Health. While active, he deals ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.øºøºøº

passive.name: ºøReign of Angerº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRenekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Rengar.name: Rengarº
Rengar.title: ºøthe Pridestalkerº
Rengar.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn every wall of his den, the trophy hunter Rengar mounts the heads, horns, claws, and fangs of the most lethal creatures in Valoran. Though his collection is extensive, he remains unsatisfied, tirelessly seeking greater game. He takes time with every kill, studying his prey, learning, and preparing himself for the next encounter with the one monster he never managed to defeat.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRengar never knew his real parents, but was raised by a human who was revered as a legendary hunter. He was an ideal pupil, intently absorbing the lessons of his father, and improving them with his uncanny feral instincts. Before his mane had fully grown, Rengar set off on his own and claimed a wide territory for himself. Along its perimeter, he mounted the skulls of his slain prey - a warning to would-be aggressors. He thought undisputed reign of a region would fulfill him, but instead, he grew restless. No beasts in his domain proved challenging prey, and without formidable adversaries to push his limits, Rengar's spirit waned. He feared that no worthwhile game remained, that he would never again feel the thrill of the hunt. Just when things seemed their bleakest, he encountered the monster. It was a disturbing, alien thing, distinctly out of place in his world. It bore huge scything claws and devoured any animal that strayed across its path. Overzealous at the prospect of a challenge, Rengar ambushed the monster in haste. It far outclassed anything he'd hunted before. Their fight was savage, and each suffered crippling wounds. Rengar lost an eye, but the most grievous blow was to his pride. He had never before failed to make the kill. Worse yet, the severity of his injuries forced him to retreat. Over the following days, he hovered on the threshold between life and death. He was wracked with pain, but beneath it, he felt a glimmer of joy. The hunt was on. If such powerful beings existed in the world, he would find them, and stack their heads high. The monster, however, was a kill he wanted to savor. On his den's largest wall, he reserves a space for the beast's head, a trophy he swears will one day be the centerpiece of his collection.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''Prey on the weak and you will survive, prey on the strong and you will live.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Rengarº
Rengar.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn every wall of his den, the trophy hunter Rengar mounts the heads, horns, claws, and fangs of the most lethal creatures in Valoran. Though his collection is extensive, he remains unsatisfied, tirelessly seeking ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøUse Rengar's ultimate to find and assassinate high priority targets in team fights and skirmishes.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøA lot of Rengar's power comes from empowered abilities he uses at the right moment - choose wisely!øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøMake sure to take paths through brush when chasing opponents to take advantage of Rengar's passive.øºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøRengar gains an empowered ability when his resource bar is full. Try to confront him when it's low.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºRengar's passive enables him to leap out of brush, so avoid fighting him when near bushes.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøRengar's ultimate grants him temporary stealth, so try to avoid traveling alone when injured.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøRengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage and grants him increased Attack Speed.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøFerocity Bonus: Rengar deals enhanced damage and doubles his Attack Speed bonus.øºøºøºøº

ºøºøThe next basic attack within 6 seconds deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø physical damage. Grants ºøº{{ e5 }}ºø% Attack Speed for øº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

ºøFerocity bonus:ººø Additionally deals øº{{ e2 }}ºø% of Rengar's Attack Damageºøº (+º)ºøºøºø in bonus damage, and the Attack Speed bonus is doubled.ºøºøº

Deals º{{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to enemies in the area. Grants ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø Armor and Magic resist for 3 seconds if an enemy is hit.ºøºøº

passive.name: ºøUnseen Predatorº
passive.description:
ºøºøºøºøWhile in brush or stealth Rengar will leap at the target when using his basic attack.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRengar builds 1 point of Ferocity with each ability he uses on enemies. When reaching 5 points of Ferocity, Rengar's next ability becomes empowered, granting it a bonus effect.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Riven.name: Rivenº
Riven.title: ºthe Exileº
Riven.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn Noxus, any citizen may rise to power regardless of race, gender, or social standing - strength is all that matters. It was with committed faith in this ideal that Riven strove to greatness. She showed early potential as a soldier, forcing herself to master the weight of a long sword when she was barely its height. She was ruthless and efficient as a warrior, but her true strength lay in her conviction. She entered battles without any trace of doubt in her mind: no ethical pause, no fear of death. Riven became a leader amongst her peers, poster child of the Noxian spirit. So exceptional was her passion that the High Command recognized her with a black stone rune sword forged and enchanted with Noxian sorcery. The weapon was heavier than a kite shield and nearly as broad - perfectly suited to her tastes. Soon after, she was deployed to Ionia as part of the Noxian invasion.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhat began as war quickly became extermination. Noxian soldiers followed the terrifying Zaunite war machines across fields of death. It wasn't the glorious combat for which Riven trained. She carried out the orders of her superiors, terminating the remnants of a beaten and fractured enemy with extreme prejudice. As the invasion continued, it became clear that the Ionian society would not be reformed, merely eliminated. During one bitter engagement, Riven's unit became surrounded by Ionian forces. They called for support as the enemy closed in around them. What they received instead was a barrage of biochemical terror launched by Singed. Riven watched as around her Ionian and Noxian alike fell victim to an unspeakably gruesome fate. She managed to escape the bombardment, though she could not erase the memory. Counted dead by Noxus, she saw an opportunity to start anew. She shattered her sword, severing ties with the past, and wandered in self-imposed exile - on a quest to seek atonement and a way to save the pure Noxian vision in which she believed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøº''There is a place between war and murder / in which our demons lurk.''ºøºøºøº
Riven.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn Noxus, any citizen may rise to power regardless of race, gender, or social standing - strength is all that matters. It was with committed faith in this ideal ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRiven's Broken Wings locks onto the champion your cursor is over at the time of cast. If you want to move past your opponent, make sure that your cursor is past your opponent as well.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRiven lacks a source of healing or strong defense and must compensate with burst combos. Lead into fights with Broken Wings and Ki Burst, while using Valor to escape and absorb counter-harass.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRiven has a great deal of mobility but she cannot move very far with any one skill. Rooting or Silencing her during her combo will greatly reduce her effectiveness.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøAll of Riven's damage is physical, prioritize high armor if an opposing Riven gets out of control.øºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRiven excels at dueling multiple melee attackers at once, as she will be on an almost equal footing damage-wise. If pairing up against Riven, don't go in as double melee until she has expended her full combo.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºBroken Wingsº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRiven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøRiven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated ºøºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø additional times.øº

º1st Use:ººø Slashes forward, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºø physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.ºøºøº
º2nd Use:ººø Slashes forward, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºø physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.ºøºøº
º3rd Use:ººøºøº Leaps into the air and slams the ground dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºøºøºø physical damage and knocking nearby enemies away from the point of impact.ºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRiven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºKi Burstº
spells.description: ºøºøºøRiven emits a Ki burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.øºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøRiven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºø physical damage and stunning them for øºøº{{ e5 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: Valorº
spells.description: ºøºøºøRiven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøRiven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºø incoming damage for 2.5 seconds.ºøº

spells.name: ºøBlade of the Exileøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRiven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy and gains attack damage and range. Additionally, during this time, she gains the ability to use Wind Slash once, a powerful ranged attack.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºRiven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for ºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø seconds, granting her ºøº{{ e5 }}ºø% extra Attack Damage (ºøº+{{ f3 }}ºøºøºøºøºø), increased range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.ºøºøºøºøº

ºWind Slash:ººøºø Riven fires a shockwave that deals from øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to º{{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})ºøºøºøºøº physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much health they are missing.ºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºRunic Bladeº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRiven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Rumble.name: Rumbleº
Rumble.title: ºøthe Mechanized Menaceøº
Rumble.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºEven amongst yordles, Rumble was always the runt of the litter. As such, he was used to being bullied. In order to survive, he had to be scrappier and more resourceful than his peers. He developed a quick temper and a reputation for getting even, no matter who crossed him. This made him something of a loner, but he didn't mind. He liked to tinker, preferring the company of gadgets, and he could usually be found rummaging through the junkyard. He showed great potential as a mechanic. His teachers recommended him for enrollment at the Yordle Academy of Science and Progress in Piltover, where he may very well have become one of Heimerdinger's esteemed proteges, but Rumble refused to go. He believed that Heimerdinger and his associates were ''sellouts,'' trading superior yordle technology to humans for nothing more than a pat on the head while yordles remained the butt of their jokes. When a group of human graduates from the Yordle Academy sailed to Bandle City to visit the place where their mentor was born and raised, Rumble couldn't resist the temptation to see them face-to-face (so to speak). He only intended to get a good look at the humans, but four hours and several choice words later, he returned home bruised and bloodied with an earful about how he was an embarrassment to ''enlightened'' yordles like Heimerdinger. The next morning he left Bandle City without a word, and wasn't seen again for months. When he returned, he was at the helm of a clanking, mechanized monstrosity. He marched it to the center of town amidst dumbfounded onlookers and there announced that he would join the League of Legends to show the world what yordle-tech was really capable of, without hiding behind a foreign banner.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''Ugh, it's gonna take forever to scrape your face off my suit!''ºøºøºøº
º-- Rumbleº
Rumble.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºEven amongst yordles, Rumble was always the runt of the litter. As such, he ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTry and pace yourself to stay in the Danger Zone to maximize your effectiveness. It is easy to overheat if you rapidly use your abilities.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøTry and keep targets in the range of your Flamespitter. It can deal a lot of damage overtime.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøIf you are winning a fight you can use your ultimate to wall off an escape path.øºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºWatch Rumble's heat bar carefully. If you see him Overheat, go in for the kill while his skills are disabled.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRumble's ultimate can deal a lot of damage if you stay inside the area of effect. When you see the missiles falling, move out of the way as quickly as possible.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºRumble deals almost entirely magic damage. Build some Magic Resistance to reduce his damage.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºFlamespitterº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased. ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøRumble torches his opponents, dealing øºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals half damage to minions.øºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøRumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø damage. Rumble also gains an additional øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº% Movement Speed for 1 second. ºøº

ºøºøºøRumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage and applying a stacking slow of ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% for 3 seconds.º

spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by ºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}º% and take º{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a2 }})ºø magic damage each second.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøºYou can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.ºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøJunkyard Titanº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEvery spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Ryze.name: Ryzeº
Ryze.title: ºøthe Rogue Mageº
Ryze.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere are many on Runeterra who are attracted to the study of magic or, in recent times, the emerging field of techmaturgy. For most, pursuit of such knowledge is formalized in a college or university. The halls of traditional study were never for Ryze, however, who felt a more raw and primal connection to the magic of Runeterra than those who tried to teach him. He struck out on his own as a young man to discover what already called to him. Ryze traveled the world, seeking the wisdom of powerful hermits, witches, and shamans - anyone who had something to share beyond what was taught in the city-states of Valoran. When he had learned all he could from these fonts of wisdom, Ryze turned to seek the lost, forgotten, and forbidden knowledge in the world, delving into mystical worlds where others feared to tread.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRyze's tireless searching for magical knowledge led him to an ancient form of spellcraft known as thorn magic. This art required Ryze to tattoo spells on his body, permanently infusing his being with vast arcane power and finally fulfilling his need to bond with the mystical energies of Runeterra. His travels also led him to uncover the giant indestructible scroll he now carries on his back - the purpose of the inscribed spell remains a secret only Ryze knows. He claims it is an abomination - something that he must safeguard from the world. This has piqued the curiosity of many, though no one is sure how to separate the scroll from Ryze, or if it is possible to overcome the rogue mage to do so. Since then, Ryze has joined the League of Legends to study the magical creatures and powerful will-workers that fight there, in order to complete his exploration of mystical Runeterra.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''Ryze is no longer just a mage - he has become a creature of magic itself.''ºøºøºøº
ºøºø-- High Councilor Heywan Relivashºøº
Ryze.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere are many on Runeterra who are attracted to the study of magic or, in recent times, the emerging field of techmaturgy. For most, pursuit of such knowledge is ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze can use himself as a conduit for his Spell Flux ability if there are no additional enemies to bounce the spell off of.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºUsing Ryze's ultimate to farm creeps can lead to a large gold advantage.ºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøBe cautious about engaging Ryze alone with less than full health.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøCleanse and Banshee's Veil are especially effective defenses against Ryze.ºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze can only lock down one player with Rune Prison. Attacking with friends is the most effective approach, but remember to avoid Spell Flux bouncing between you and your allies.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºOverloadº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze throws a charge of pure energy at an enemy for heavy damage and additional damage based upon Ryze's maximum mana.  Ryze also gains passive cooldown reduction.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ºGains º{{ e2 }}ºø% cooldown reduction.øº

ºActive: ºDeals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºø in magic damage. øº

spells.name: ºRune Prisonº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRyze traps target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.  Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøRoots an enemy for øº{{ e1 }}ºø second(s), dealing øº{{ e2 }} (+º{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºø in magic damage. øº

spells.name: ºSpell Fluxº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze releases an orb of pure magical power that deals damage and bounces from the initial target up to 6 times.  Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana.  Targets hit have their magic resistance reduced.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøUnleashes an orb that bounces to enemies or Ryze up to 5 times. Each bounce deals øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºøºø magic damage and reduces Magic Resist by øºøº{{ e2 }}ºø for 5 seconds.º

spells.name: ºøDesperate Powerº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøRyze channels immense arcane power, he gains spell vamp and all of his spells deal area of effect damage.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøChannels immense arcane power gaining øºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% Spell Vamp, and øº{{ e4 }}ºøºøºø Movement Speed. Spells deal 50% area of effect damage for øºøºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºøArcane Masteryº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøWhen Ryze casts a spell, all other spells have their cooldown reduced by 1 second.øºøºøºøº

Sejuani.name: Sejuaniº
Sejuani.title: ºøthe Winter's Wrathøº
Sejuani.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSejuani was weaned on hardship and reared on barbarity. Where others succumbed to the harshness of the Freljord, she was tempered by it until pain became power, hunger an encouragement, and frost an ally in culling the weak. Through her ordeals, she learned that to thrive in the endless winter, one must become just as cold and unforgiving. In Sejuani's eyes, her followers either have the mettle to endure or the right to die. Once she has conquered the Freljord, she knows that those who survive will form a nation to be feared.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAs a child, the leader of the Winter's Claw watched her tribe's numbers slowly dwindle. Cold and starvation took all but the most resilient. She was the only one of her siblings to survive to her tenth year, leaving Sejuani sure that she too would die in misery. In desperation, she sought spiritual counsel from her tribe's mystic. But the seer did not foretell Sejuani's death. Instead, she prophesized that Sejuani would one day conquer and unite the divided tribes of the Freljord.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøArmored with absolute faith in her destiny, Sejuani pushed herself to extremes that would have killed anyone without her will to endure. She walked into blizzards without food or furs and trained while frigid winds raked her flesh. She clashed with the strongest warriors of her tribe, one after another, until her legs gave out beneath her. When she assumed leadership of her tribe, Sejuani commanded her warriors to follow her example. Under her rule, the tribe grew stronger than they had ever been.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn the end, it was an offer of peace - rather than an act of war - that began Sejuani's campaign of conquest. On the first day of winter, envoys from Ashe's tribe approached Sejuani's camp bearing a gift of Avarosan grain. Ashe's intent was clear: if Sejuani united with her tribe, the Winter's Claw would never go hungry again. To Sejuani, the gift was an insult. In Ashe's tribe, she saw men and women, slight and soft, who preferred to farm instead of fight. Her contempt for them was absolute.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSejuani gathered her people and set the grain alight. She proclaimed that Ashe's offer of charity would bring only weakness. Stripping the envoys of their supplies, Sejuani sent them back with a message: the Winter's Claw would prove to the Avarosan that only the strong deserve to survive in the Freljord. As the grain burned behind them, Sejuani rode out with her warband to inflict the first of many painful lessons to come.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøº''I was cut from the ice, shaped in the storms, hardened in the cold.''ºøºøºøº
º-- Sejuaniº
Sejuani.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSejuani was weaned on hardship and reared on barbarity. Where others succumbed to the harshness of the Freljord, she was tempered by it until pain became power, hunger an encouragement, and frost an ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøArctic Assault provides a lot of utility to Sejuani beyond its damage output. Use it to escape bad situations, interupt channeled spells or chase runners.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPermafrost has a long range. Saving it until an enemy attempts to escape with a movement ability can allow you to catch back up to them while they're slowed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºSave Glacial Prison for encounters where you have teammates present to take advantage of it.ºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøDodging Arctic Assault and Glacial Prison can give you a huge advantage. Master using movement abilities or Summoner spells like Flash when Sejuani tries to engage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºStun, slow, or knockback Sejuani when she activates Northern Winds to reduce her ability to deal damage with it.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøArctic Assaultº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøCharges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøCharges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing magic damage equal to øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºøºø% of the target's maximum Health (max øºøº{{ e4 }}ºøºøºøºø damage to monsters). The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøFlail of the Northern Windsºøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then spins her flail, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøSejuani's next basic attack deals ºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºøºøºøºøº bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then swings her flail, dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}º% bonus HP])º (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøIf this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.øºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºPermafrostº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøAbilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive:ººøºøºø Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds. ºøºøºøº

Active:ººøºø All nearby enemies with Frost take ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and are slowed by ºøº{{ e3 }}% for º{{ e4 }}º seconds. º

spells.name: ºøGlacial Prisonº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for ºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºø seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by øºøºøºøº{{ e5 }}% for º{{ e2 }}ºø seconds instead.º

ºøºøAll enemies in the shatter area take ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

passive.name: Frostº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøDamaging an enemy with an ability or basic attack grants Sejuani bonus Armor and reduces movement-slowing effects on her.øºøºøºøºøºøº

Shaco.name: Shacoº
Shaco.title: ºøthe Demon Jesterº
Shaco.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºMost would say that death isn't funny. It isn't, unless you're Shaco - then it's hysterical. He is Valoran's first fully functioning homicidal comic; he jests until someone dies, and then he laughs. The figure that has come to be known as the Demon Jester is an enigma. No one fully agrees from whence he came, and Shaco never offers any details on his own. A popular belief is that Shaco is not of Runeterra - that he is a thing summoned from a dark and twisted world. Still others believe that he is the demonic manifestation of humanity's dark urges and therefore cannot be reasoned with. The most plausible belief is that Shaco is an assassin for hire, left to his own lunatic devices until his services are needed. Shaco certainly has proven himself to be a cunning individual, evading authorities at every turn who might seek him for questioning for some horrendous, law-breaking atrocity. While such scuttlebutt might reassure the native inhabitants of Valoran, it seems unimaginable that such a malfeasant figure is allowed to remain at large.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhatever the truth of his history might be, Shaco has joined the League of Legends for reasons only he knows. He is a terrifying figure, typically shunned by both his fellow champions and the media at large. Only the summoners in the Institute of War know why such a creature was allowed into the League, but most Runeterrans suspect it to be a means that allows the power that be to keep an eye on the ever-elusive Shaco. Unsurprisingly, this champion is popular in places where madness can openly reign, such as among the power-hungry summoners of Zaun and Noxus.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøWhatever you do, don't tell him you missed the punch line.øºøºøº
Shaco.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºMost would say that death isn't funny. It isn't, unless you're Shaco - then it's hysterical. He is Valoran's first fully functioning homicidal ...
allytips: ºøºøºøUsing Deceive over terrain can help you make a clean escape.øºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºTry getting items with on-hit effects. These will also benefit your Hallucination clone.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºDeceive's damage can be increased with increased Critical Damage effects like Infinity Edge.ºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøIf Shaco is doing well early-game, it is worth the investment to buy Vision Wards.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIf Shaco uses Deceive to enter a fight he won't be able to quickly use it again to get away. Work with your team to quickly focus him down.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: Deceiveº

spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøShaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.øºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøHis next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºø% damage (normal critical strikes deal øºøº{{ e2 }}º% damage).º

spells.name: ºøJack In The Boxº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºShaco creates an animated Jack-in-the-Box at target location, which will wait, invisible, to Fear nearby units and attack them when some come nearby. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøº seconds and attacking them.ºøº

ºøIts attacks deal º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and it lasts for ºøº{{ e4 }}ºøºøº seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing. ºøºøº

spells.name: ºøTwo-Shiv Poisonº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing them and applying a miss chance to minions. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºøºøºøWhile Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by øºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e4 }}ºøºøº seconds. Also reduces minions' chance to hit by ºøºøº{{ e3 }}% for º{{ e4 }}º seconds.º

ºActive: ºDeals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) ºøºøºømagic damage to target enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}% for º{{ e5 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºHallucinateº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºShaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºShaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives ºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% increased damage.øº

ºøºøOn death, the clone detonates, dealing øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage to nearby enemies.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøThe clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.ºøºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºBackstabº
passive.description: ºøºøºøShaco deals 20% bonus damage when striking a unit from behind.øºøºøº

Shen.name: Shenº
Shen.title: ºøEye of Twilightº
Shen.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance. Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of the universe. This order is known as the Kinkou and it employs a triumvirate of shadow warriors to uphold its causes in the world. Shen is one of these shadow warriors, entrusted with the sacred duty of Watching the Stars - exercising judgment untainted by prejudice.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºBorn to a clan whose members have decorated the ranks of the Kinkou for generations, Shen was trained his entire life to become the Eye of Twilight, and thereupon to dispassionately determine what must be done in the interests of equilibrium. As his final trial to ascend to this position, he was made to attend the Takanu, a ceremony in which his father was tortured before his eyes to test his resolve. Any reaction whatsoever would have resulted in his immediate disqualification, but he never averted his gaze and never blinked, not once. As the Eye of Twilight, Shen must make decisions that would buckle the wills of ordinary men, removing all emotion from the equation. He now works with his fellows Akali and Kennen to enforce the balance of Valoran. This hallowed pursuit has unsurprisingly led the triumvirate to the Fields of Justice.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºThe Eye of Twilight sees not the despair of its victims, only the elegance of equilibrium.ºøºøºøºøº
Shen.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance.  Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºShadow Dash restores more energy if it hits multiple enemy champions, so don't always use it on a single target.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTry to keep an eye on your allies' health, even if in remote lanes, as Stand United can be used anywhere on the map.  You can use F2-F5 to target them quickly.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøShen is a very durable champion, with multiple ways to absorb damage.  Be wary about attacking him when he seems weak.øºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøHe can also teleport to any ally's aid, regardless of location, so be aware that a 1v1 fight can turn into 1v2 very quickly with Shen.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Deals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº magic damage to target unit and marks them for ºøºøº{{ e4 }}º seconds.º

ºøºøºøAllied spells and attacks against this target heal them for øºøºøº{{ f1 }} ({{ e2 }} + {{ f2 }} [{{ e3 }}ºø% of Shen's max Health]ºøº) over º{{ e5 }}º seconds.º

ºøºøKilling an enemy with Vorpal Blade restores ºøºøº{{ f3 }}ºø Health instantly instead.ºøº

passive.description: ºøºøºøEvery 8 seconds, Shen's next attack deals bonus damage.ºøºøº

Shyvana.name: Shyvanaº
Shyvana.title: ºøthe Half-Dragonº
Shyvana.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA half-breed born from the union between dragon and human, Shyvana searched all her life for belonging. Persecution forged her into a brutal warrior, and those who dare stand against Shyvana face the fiery beast lurking just beneath her skin.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºDragonkind considered Shyvana's impure blood an abomination, and she spent her youth pursued relentlessly by one cruel drake. Constantly on the run, she and her father, an outcast dragon, never knew a lasting home. A brutal reflection of countless battles, Shyvana grew hateful and savage. After years of strife, her father finally fell to the other dragon, but not before gravely wounding his foe. Furious with grief, Shyvana pursued her father's murderer as he fled north to recover. There she encountered a group of humans on the trail of the same drake. Though the men looked upon her in fear, their leader approached Shyvana peacefully. He introduced himself as Jarvan IV, the Prince of Demacia, and offered to aid Shyvana in her quest for vengeance. Together they hunted down and confronted the vicious dragon that had slain her father. Shyvana did not expect the men to survive, but in the clash of fire and steel, Jarvan and his men fought with strength she had never believed humans to possess. The ironclad warriors drove their foe into submission, and Shyvana struck the final blow, tearing the beast's heart from its body. Inspired by her ferocity, Jarvan offered her a place in the ranks of his elite guard. Shyvana could still see fear in the eyes of his men, but she longed for a true home. Trusting Jarvan's word, she accepted his offer and now serves as a Demacian warrior. Though her human allies admire her power, they keep their distance. Shyvana strives to repay the prince's kindness with the power of the dragon within, but she cannot help but wonder if the humans are right to fear her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''I have proven my might to dragonkind - what challenge shall humans pose?''ºøºøºøº
º-- Shyvanaº
Shyvana.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA half-breed born from the union between dragon and human, Shyvana searched all her life for belonging. Persecution forged her into a brutal warrior, and those who dare stand against Shyvana face the fiery beast lurking just ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºShyvana's abilities all benefit from attacking units. As a result, Attack Speed items are more valuable on her than most champions.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøFlame Breath is great to level-up against difficult lane opponents.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBurnout is an ideal choice for jungling. Monsters will be hit by the full duration, and the speed boost improves her ganking potential.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøIt can be valuable to purchase one of the items that can slow enemies: Phage, Frozen Mallet, Trinity Force, or Entropy.øºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA significant portion of Shyvana's power is generated through aggression, making her weak against opponents who are able to keep their distance.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAll of Shyvana's basic abilities hit multiple enemies in dragon form. It's important for opposing champions to not cluster while fighting her.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShyvana's Fury Bar is an indicator for when her ultimate can be activated. Harassing her when she's low on Fury can be very effective.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Singed.name: Singedº
Singed.title: ºøthe Mad Chemistº
Singed.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSinged descended from a long line of Zaun's revered chemists. Even in his youth, his talent for concocting potions far outstripped that of his peers, and he quickly distinguished himself from his less extraordinary chemist compatriots. It came as no surprise to anyone when he was selected for apprenticeship by the infamous Warwick, master apothecary on a lucrative retainer with the Noxian military during their campaign against Ionia. Within Warwick's laboratories, Singed toiled without end, rapidly absorbing every detail of his predecessor's deadly craft. Singed had little concern for the death and destruction that was the fruit of his labors. By the time the curse of lycanthropy descended to claim his master, Singed was poised and eager to make the transition from workhorse to innovator; he was ready to share his genius by bringing a new brand of suffering to the Ionian front. His zeal for progress was unquenchable, and when suitable test subjects proved to be in short supply, the eager chemist was often thought to turn his volatile mixtures on his own flesh.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhen the uneasy peace created by the League of Legends settled on the world, Singed journeyed to the one place where he was still able to showcase his beloved craft: the Institute of War. By this time he was barely even a man, his body both ruined and sustained by his ingenious craft. A thousand burns - accidents of shadow and flame - mar his ravaged form, and exposure to such harsh conditions has deadened his nerves, hardened his body, and strengthened his physique, transforming him into a veritable juggernaut. This, combined with a formidable arsenal of deadly concoctions, makes Singed a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº''My deadliest dose shall bear my patron's name!''ºøºøº
ºøºøºø-- Singed, having just christened the Insanity Potionºøºøº
Singed.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSinged descended from a long line of Zaun's revered chemists. Even in his youth, his talent for concocting potions far outstripped that of his ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøPoison Trail is very effective at farming and harassing, allowing Singed to dominate the flow of whatever lane he's in.øºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøUse Insanity Potion to trick your opponents into chasing you through your Poison Trail.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøFlinging enemies into your tower can deal heavy amounts of damage to them.ºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøKeep your distance to avoid being Flung back into Singed's allies.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSinged needs to run close to your team to be effective. Try to take advantage of this by using crowd control effects on him while attacking his allies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºBe careful when chasing Singed. He's very difficult to bring down, and can leave his Poison Trail to damage you in your pursuit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

Sion.name: Sionº
Sion.title: ºøthe Undead Championøº
Sion.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPrior to the creation of the League of Legends, the city-states of Demacia and Noxus were locked in a brutal series of on-again-off-again wars that spanned the course of centuries. Both powers sought an advantage over the other, but Noxus was the city-state willing to forego conventional morality to achieve its goals. Only brute strength and the will to use it mattered to Noxus, and this is best exemplified in the murderous warrior, Sion. Used by the Noxians as a human battering ram, Sion would be sent thundering ahead of Noxian troops. He would mercilessly slaughter foes with his large double-bladed axe, ''Chopper''. His complete disregard for caution ultimately cost him his life, as he was captured and summarily executed by Demacian forces.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe Demacians thought that the beheading of Sion would be the end of his bloodthirsty ways. Death, however, was merely the beginning of Sion's rise to power. The famed Noxian assassin, Katarina, recovered Sion's remains and Noxian necromancers reanimated the behemoth to serve Noxus once again. Sion's reanimation actually bestowed new powers on him and increased the potency of his existing abilities, making him even more of a terror to behold on the battlefield. The Noxian High Command had a powerful new weapon in their hands - one they have brought to bear as a champion in the League of Legends. Even though Sion's increased powers would make him a powerful tool for the High Command's use outside the Fields of Justice, Noxus no longer risks losing one of their greatest champions in the League to chance or circumstance; Sion's days as a front-line fighter for Noxus' military conquests are at an end.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºø''For Noxus, death is a promotion.''ºøº
º-- Pantheonº
Sion.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPrior to the creation of the League of Legends, the city-states of Demacia and Noxus were locked in a brutal series of on-again-off-again wars that spanned the course of ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUsing Enrage early helps Sion in the late game. When Sion kills something his health is increased permanently and Enrage makes it easier to last hit resulting in better gold farming.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøCryptic Gaze and Cannibalize can both be used in a defensive manner to save allies and sustain pushes.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøDeath's Caress and Cryptic Gaze scale very well with AP and can greatly increase your ganking strength.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøIf Death's Caress is on Sion, it is often worth casting a damaging spell to ensure that the shield doesn't explode.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºTry disabling Sion while his ultimate is active.ºøºøº

ºøºøºSion surrounds himself with a shield which absorbs ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø damage. If the shield is not destroyed in 10 seconds, it will explode, dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to surrounding enemies.ºøº

spells.tooltip: ºGrants Sion º{{ e1 }}ºø% Life Steal and º{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøºøºø% Attack Speed for 20 seconds. Additionally, Sion's basic attacks heal surrounding allies for ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% of the damage dealt.øº

passive.name: ºFeel No Painº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøSion has a 40% chance to ignore up to 30/40/50 damage each time he is attacked.øºøºøºøº

Sivir.name: Sivirº
Sivir.title: ºøthe Battle Mistressøº
Sivir.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe beautiful and deadly champion known as Sivir has been a favorite of League summoners for close to a decade. A soldier-for-hire outside of the Fields of Justice, she is the embodiment of a highly successful mercenary on modern day Runeterra. Sivir has little interest in the ''cribbage sheets'' - as she calls them - of League influence bartering. Instead, she is motivated by material wealth and riches, and she is paid handsomely for her services. Sivir is one of the wealthiest individuals found anywhere on Valoran. Sivir owns multiple residences in a number of different city-states, as well as ownership stakes in a number of businesses all across Valoran. Her detractors, either envious of her success or acrimonious of her flexible morality, have begun to use Sivir as a symbol of what is wrong with the mercenary nature of the League. Sivir dismisses her critics, saying that while her personal code of ethics is less ruthless than her competitors, ''Everyone has a price.''ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir has earned many titles and accolades throughout her illustrious career, but the one she held until recently was ''Battle Mistress of Noxus''. Now she is simply known as ''The Battle Mistress'' after breaking her contract with the Noxian High Command. Sivir dared to object to the Noxian war against the peaceful island state of Ionia, though less about the morality of the issue than the planning behind it; her predictions of a bloody stalemate came true when the Ionians held off the relentless assaults of the Noxians. Claiming that the Noxian High Command had lost its direction, she left Noxus and made her services available to the Institute of War. The Noxian High Command has sent a number of contracted assassins to deal with its rogue mercenary, but none have delivered her or survived.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''Time and time again, Sivir proves that she has earned the right to call herself 'The Battle Mistress'.''ºøºøºøºøºøº
-- Jaxº
Sivir.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe beautiful and deadly champion known as Sivir has been a favorite of League summoners for close to a decade.  A soldier-for-hire outside of the ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir's Boomerang Blade returns to her after reaching the max range, so you can shift position to hit enemies who would otherwise have evaded it.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºUsing Frozen Mallet or Phage in conjunction with On the Hunt ensures that you and your teammates are able to hit opponents non-stop.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRicochet resets Sivir's basic attack timer on activation, so activating this immediately after landing a normal basic attack will maximize damage output.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBoomerang Blade costs a lot of mana to cast, so dodging it sets Sivir back. If it hits you on the way out, avoid its path on the way back.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir is a powerful pushing champion, so leaving her unattended in a lane for too long will often result in your turrets being destroyed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen laning against Sivir as a caster, it may be possible to throw off Sivir's timing on her Spell Shield by faking an advance and backing off.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºSpell Shieldº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøCreates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana  back if a spell is blocked.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøSivir creates a magical barrier for ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºø seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøIf an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains ºøºøº{{ e2 }} Mana.º

spells.name: ºOn The Huntº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøSivir leads her allies into battle granting them increased Movement and Attack Speeds for a period of time.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøSivir's battle prowess emanates for ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø seconds, increasing her Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% and Attack Speed by øº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºøºø%. Nearby allies gain the Movement Speed bonus and half of the Attack Speed bonus for the duration.øºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøFleet of Footº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøSivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.øºøºøºøº

Skarner.name: Skarnerº
Skarner.title: ºøthe Crystal Vanguardøº
Skarner.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºCenturies ago, there lived a race of creatures as ferocious as they were wise. The Brackern were unusual beings blessed with the earth's primal magic, embodied in the form of crystals. Their kind knew of an arcane ritual to bind their life's essence to a crystal, communing with the magic embedded in it. With this power, the Brackern thrived in the Odyn Valley, protecting both creatures and crystals alike. Despite attacks from those looking to claim the primal magic, it seemed that nothing could get past the Brackern's defenses. Nothing, that is, until the devastation of a Rune War.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA vicious battle was fought near the Odyn Valley and the unleashed chaotic magic poisoned the crystals. The Brackern began to grow sick and die, and no amount of defensive magic could reverse the effects. To avoid extinction, their only course was to hibernate underground until the wars stopped. The strongest, most intelligent Brackern hibernated closer to the surface to awaken first and assess the world's condition for the return of their race. The recent mining operations and violent escalation in Kalamanda were enough to awaken the first of these vanguards. When Skarner burst to the surface, he lashed out in anger and confusion. Reason eventually won out over his anger when he realized that the agents of the League who found him were simply functionaries. Skarner was invited to the Institute of War to share the Brackern's story. In return, the summoners told him about the history that his kind had slept through. Much had been done to curb the unchecked use of magic since the Rune Wars, but it was obvious that the world was not yet safe for his kind to reawaken. For now, however, there is a place where Skarner can use his power to change the world into one to which his kind could eventually return: the League of Legends.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºø''The humans have not yet learned to control their magic - what once was Kalamanda is now a crystal scar on the history of this world.''ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
º-- Skarnerº
Skarner.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºCenturies ago, there lived a race of creatures as ferocious as they were wise. The Brackern were unusual beings blessed with the earth's primal magic, embodied in the form of crystals. Their ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøYour basic attacks will reduce the cooldown of your abilities--use basic attacks between Crystal Slashes for maximum damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºHit a number of enemies with Fracture, and then follow up with a Crystal Slash to quickly gain a lot of health.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøImpale is extremely powerful when you use it to position an enemy so your allies can attack them.ºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøSkarner can't harm you very much outside of short range, so stay away from him!øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSkarner's movement speed and attack speed are increased as long as his shield, Crystalline Exoskeleton, persists.  Attack him to lower his speed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSome Skarners will have lots of defensive items, while others may build offensively. Check the items your enemy has to determine how to beat them.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøCrystal Slashº

If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage and slows all targets hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøWhile Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals ºøºøº{{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø bonus magic damage and slows by ºøº{{ e3 }}ºø% for 2 seconds.º

During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him.  When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøSkarner suppresses an enemy champion for øºøº{{ e1 }}ºø seconds and deals øº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºø magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

Sona.name: Sonaº
Sona.title: ºøMaven of the Stringsøº
Sona.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSona has no memories of her true parents. As an infant, she was found abandoned on the doorstep of an Ionian adoption house, nestled atop an ancient instrument in an exquisite case of unknown origins. She was an unusually well-behaved child, always quiet and content. Her caretakers were sure she would find a home quickly, but it soon became apparent that what they mistook for uncommon geniality was actually an inability to speak or to produce any sound whatsoever. Sona remained at the adoption house until her teens, watching in hopeless silence as prospective adopters passed her by. During this time, the caretakers sold her unusual instrument to anxious collectors, hoping to build her a trust. For a myriad of bizarre and unexpected reasons, however, it would be returned, or simply appear again outside the house.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen a wealthy Demacian woman named Lestara Buvelle learned of the instrument, she immediately embarked to Ionia. When the caretakers showcased the instrument for her, she rose wordlessly and explored the house, stopping outside Sona's room. Without hesitation, Lestara adopted her and left a generous donation for the instrument. With Lestara's guidance, Sona discovered a deep connection with the instrument which Lestara called an 'etwahl'. In her hands, it played tones which stilled or quivered the hearts of those around her. Within months, she was headlining with the mysterious etwahl for sold-out audiences. She played as though plucking heartstrings, effortlessly manipulating the emotions of her listeners - all without a single written note. In secret, she discovered a potent and deadly use for her etwahl, using its vibrations to slice objects from a distance. She honed this discipline in private, mastering her gift. When she felt prepared, she went to the only place which could offer her a fitting recital: the League of Legends.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''Her melody moves the soul, her silence sunders the body.''øºøºøº
ºøºø-- Jericho Swain, after attending her concertºøºøº
Sona.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSona has no memories of her true parents. As an infant, she was found abandoned on the doorstep of an Ionian adoption house, nestled atop an ancient instrument in an ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøMake use of Hymn of Valor's bonus ability power for empowering your next spell.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøSave Crescendo for the game-altering moment.ºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºConstantly switching between Song of Celerity and Aria of Perseverance will grant you maximum survivability.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºSpread out when you see Sona so she can't make your entire team dance.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøKill Sona first, as she will heal up her team if left alone for too long.ºøºøºøº

spells.tooltip:
ºøPersistent Aura:ººøºøºøºø Increases the Attack Damage and Ability Power of nearby allied Champions by ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}.

ºActivation:º Deals º{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions).ºøºøºøº

ºøPersistent Aura:ººøº Grants nearby allied Champions ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøº bonus Armor and Magic Resist.ºøº

ºActivation:ººøºøºø Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for øºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) ºand grants º{{ e1 }}ºøºøº additional Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.ºøºøº

ºøPower Chord - Diminuendo:ºøººøºøºø Reduces an enemy's total damage output by 20% for 3 seconds.øºøºøº

spells.tooltip:
ºøPersistent Aura:ººøº Grants nearby allied Champions ºøº{{ e1 }}ºø bonus Movement Speed.øº

ºActivation:ººø Grants nearby allies øº{{ e2 }}ºøºø% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.ºøº

ºøPower Chord - Tempo:øººøºø Slows an enemy by 40% for 2 seconds.ºøº

Soraka.name: Sorakaº
Soraka.title: ºøthe Starchildº
Soraka.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA healer gifted with the magic of the stars, Soraka holds all living creatures close to her heart. She was once a celestial being, but she sacrificed her immortality and entered the world of mortals. So long as evil threatens life in Valoran, Soraka will not allow herself peace.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSoraka lived for centuries in an enchanted grove. A being of the stars, she healed the wounded and sick that sought her out. One man called Warwick came to her grove and begged her to heal his wife, who lay lifeless in his arms. His despair touched Soraka's heart. Though it was too late to save his wife, she offered to help heal the pain of his loss. Unwilling to let go of his grief Warwick ran from the grove, but returned over the following days to hear Soraka's guidance. She began to grow attached to the grieving man. One day Warwick told her he had found the men who killed his wife. He believed revenge would heal his pain - and if he died fighting, he would at least find peace. Though she pleaded with him, Warwick ignored her and left the grove. The voices of the stars warned her not to follow him, but Soraka had to intervene.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøShe stepped into the mortal world for the first time, and soon found Warwick desperately fighting a group of men. She tried to heal him, but for every wound she closed, the men inflicted two more. Soraka realized that she would have to fight to save her friend. The stars screamed in her mind, telling her not to use her powers for harm. Ignoring their warning, she struck the attackers with a flash of brilliant light. Crying out in terror and shielding their eyes from her divine radiance, they fled. Soraka's celestial form faded and the stars fell silent - for her transgression, she became mortal. She still felt the power of the stars within her, but they no longer offered her guidance. She took comfort in Warwick's safety, gently healing his wounds, but the man she had called her friend slipped a dagger between her ribs. As her blood spilled, Soraka realized he had fooled her, and everything he had done was a complicated ruse. Feeling humiliated and betrayed she called once more on the power of the stars, searing his flesh and cursing his cruelty. He retreated with an agonized howl, leaving Soraka to reflect upon her fate. Though her life had changed, she felt empowered and renewed with a singular purpose. No longer bound to the grove, Soraka set out into the mortal world, vowing to heal the wounded and protect the helpless.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''The cruelty of one will not blind me to the suffering of many.''ºøºøºøº
º-- Sorakaº
Soraka.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøA healer gifted with the magic of the stars, Soraka holds all living creatures close to her heart. She was once a celestial being, but she sacrificed her immortality and entered the world of mortals. So long as evil ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøSoraka is a powerful ally in battle, using her healing and mana restoration spells to keep the party moving forward.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøYou can use Wish on your allies from across the map to save them from otherwise fatal events.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøStarcall's damage can really add up when used consecutively.øºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøFocus on attacking Soraka if she ever ventures to the frontline in a team fight.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøIf your team has several casters, it's worth investing in an Abyssal Scepter to counter Soraka's passive.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøWatch out for Soraka's Starcall debuff - the negative magic resist can begin to add up.ºøºøºøºøº

Swain.name: Swainº
Swain.title: ºøthe Master Tacticianøº
Swain.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe earliest account of Swain's existence comes from a Noxian infirmary doctor's notes. According to them, Swain limped into the ward without cry or complaint; his right leg was snapped in half, with bone protruding from the skin. A small, scowling bird seemed affixed to his shoulder. The doctor gawked in horror as the young adolescent answered questions about his health and age with a calm, even stare. Even behind the echoing crack as the sand counterweights reset his tibia, Swain's measuring gaze never flickered, nor did his eyes twitch from the pop of his fibula. He refused the doctor's recommendation of magical treatment for the leg's inoperable damage, requesting only a spare crutch before shuffling away. He next surfaced in documents from the Noxian military, although it is evident that they are incomplete. Normally a crippled boy would be turned away in shame from Noxus' proud legion, but the records indicate his first designation was that of a ranking officer.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThe men who've served under him (and survived) have remained in his charge with unshakable faith and loyalty. He leapt through the High Command's hierarchy, often ascending when superiors requested demotions to join his unit. A cunning strategist, Swain was decorated after every battle he fought, regularly hobbling in contemplation at the front of the assault. His rise to power seemed unceasing until he was suddenly relegated to inactive status prior to the Ionian Invasion - a bewildering decision which reeked of bureaucratic subversion. If Swain was upset by the events which unfolded, he never belied it. His face was so implacable that it was popularly rumored to be a mask, disguising something utterly inhuman beneath. More controversy surrounded the bird that never left his shoulder, whose name he whispered only to it. When Demacia escalated its presence in the League, Swain was immediately returned to active duty.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''If you haven't yet lost the ability to ask, you may not yet ask for relief.''øºøºøºøº
-Swainº

Syndra.name: Syndraº
Syndra.title: ºøthe Dark Sovereignøº
Syndra.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBorn with immense magical potential, Syndra loves nothing more than exercising the incredible power at her command. With each passing day, her mastery of magical force grows more potent and devastating. Refusing any notion of balance or restraint, Syndra wants only to retain control of her power, even if it means annihilating the authorities that seek to stop her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThroughout her youth in Ionia, Syndra's reckless use of magic terrified the elders of her village. They took her to a remote temple, leaving her in the care of an old mage. To Syndra's delight, the mage explained that the temple was a school - a place where she could develop her talents under his guidance. Though she learned much during her time there, Syndra no longer felt her power growing as it had in her youth. Her frustration grew, and she finally confronted her mentor, demanding an explanation. He revealed that he had dampened Syndra's magic, hoping to help her learn control and restraint. Accusing him of betrayal, she advanced on the mage, commanding him to lift the spell that was holding her back. He backed away, telling her that if she couldn't control herself, he would be forced to nullify Syndra's magic completely. Furious, she summoned her power and dashed the old man against the walls. With her mentor dead, Syndra felt the rush of her unbounded potential for the first time in years. Though she had won her freedom, she refused to return to the society that had tried to steal her gift. Instead, Syndra decided to claim her former prison as a stronghold. Pushing the boundaries of her magic, she tore the structure from its foundations and raised it into the sky. Free to delve further into her art, Syndra now aims to grow powerful enough to destroy the weak, foolish leaders of Ionia - and anyone else who would dare to shackle her greatness.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºø''Power belongs to those who can wield it.''ºøºøº
º-- Syndraº

Talon.name: Talonº
Talon.title: ºøthe Blade's Shadowøº
Talon.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTalon's earliest memories are the darkness of Noxus' underground passages and the reassuring steel of a blade. He remembers no family, warmth, or kindness. Instead, the clink of stolen gold and the security of a wall at his back are all the kinship he has ever craved. Kept alive only by his quick wits and deft thievery, Talon scraped out a living in the seedy underbelly of Noxus. His mastery of the blade quickly marked him as a threat, and Noxian guilds sent assassins to him with a demand: join their ranks or be killed. He left the bodies of his pursuers dumped in Noxus' moat as his response.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe assassination attempts grew increasingly dangerous until one assailant met Talon blade-for-blade in a match of strength. To his surprise, Talon was disarmed and facing down his executioner's sword when the assassin revealed himself to be General Du Couteau. The General offered Talon the choice between death at his hand, or life as an agent of the Noxian High Command. Talon chose life, on the condition that his service was to Du Couteau alone, for the only type of orders he could respect were from one he could not defeat. Talon remained in the shadows, carrying out secret missions on Du Couteau's orders that took him from the frigid lands of Freljord to the inner sanctums of Bandle City. When the general vanished, Talon considered reclaiming his freedom, but he had gained immense respect for Du Couteau after years in his service. He became obsessed with tracking down the general's whereabouts. Talon's suspicions led him to the doors of the Institute of War, where he joined the League of Legends in order to find those responsible for Du Couteau's disappearance.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº''The three deadliest blademasters in all of Valoran are bound to the house of Du Couteau: my father, myself, and Talon. Challenge us, if you dare.''ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºø-- Katarina Du Couteauøº
Talon.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTalon's earliest memories are the darkness of Noxus' underground passages and the reassuring steel of a blade. He remembers no family, warmth, or kindness. Instead, the clink of stolen gold ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºø*Noxian Diplomacy naturally works well with Cutthroat. Try activating Noxian Diplomacy before leaping on your opponent with Cutthroat.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºø*Shadow Assault is a powerful escape tool, but can also be offensively used to assault a group.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºø*Remember to pick your target before the fight. Focusing all of Talon's abilities on one target can be very rewarding, but splitting them up between many may leave you helpless.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøº*Talon's attacks are all physical damage. Build armor early to counter his burst damage.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºø*Talon is heavily reliant on Shadow Assault to escape a fight. When it is down he's significantly more vulnerable.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºø*Talon has no healing or sustain abilities. Weakening him in lane could force him to return to base.øºøºøºøºøº
